transcript.sentence: Text on screen outfit seven.
Ben is taking the back of the fridge apart.
Ben get shocked.
Ben and students celebrate winning while judges clap.
Students lift ben into the air in celebration.
Opening credits. Tom, a grey cat, ben, a brown dog,
Angela, a white cat,
ginger, an orange kitten,
hank, a white dog with blue spots, title talking, tom and friends.
The students look intimidated except ginger, who is drawing in his notebook.
Ben takes ginger's notebook and sees a drawing of himself.
Student glare and make threatening gestures.
Tom is trying to fix the fridge.
At school, a student bangs his head on the desk,
another sticks pencils up his nose.
A girl shoots ginger with a slingshot.
The students getting up against ginger.
The students are lined up like an army.
Students hold up tubes and take deep breaths.
The students blow spit balls at ben.
At home, tom wraps the fridge in duct tape.
Ben shakes off the spit.
Tom is outside with binoculars, communicating with ben by headset.
Ben puts on sunglasses and a hat.
Ben kicks down the class door and hit some hip hop poses in front of the class.
He rips the blackboard from the wall.
The students throw their books in the air and then play video games.
Ben teaches ginger. Some dance moves.
The students raised through the co school hall on wield chairs.
In a panic, ben throws sunglasses and headset into the garbage.
He re attaches the blackboard and takes video games from the student.
He pushes the class door back into.
Ginger launches a paper airplane that immediately nose dives.
Ben straightens the airplane and launches it into a loop.
The students launch paper airplanes around the room.
The door falls down as velma enters the room.
Ginger writes calculations on the blackboard.
Ginger lunches. His improved plane,
As it flies smoothly, a wave almas mouth hangs open.
Are there students launched their planes? Two,
Tom watches through binoculars and smiles.
Velma drops her book.
Ginger as plane lands gently in film as hands.
Photos of students winning the science fair of been holding a first place ribbon well velma skulls of elmer taking the ribbon from ben and pinning it on herself.
Hank kisses the repaired fridge.
Mike peeks out from behind the fridge.
Closing credits and scenes from the next episode.

10:37 Mike peeks out from behind the fridge and gives a thumbs up

tags: talking tom and friends full episodes
Talking Tom and Friends | Season 3 Episode 13
result.title: The Substitute Teacher - Talking Tom and Friends | Season 3 Episode 13
result.description:
Talking Ben’s a substitute teacher and he’s got epic ideas for the kids’ science fair project! But with Talking Ginger in the class, things don’t quite go to plan.

Get Season 1 Talking Tom and Friends episodes:
http://outfit7.com/talking-tom-and-friends/
 
Subscribe to Talking Tom and Friends YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/TalkingFriends?sub_confirmation=1
 
Join Talking Tom and the crew on their quest for stardom! Tom and Talking Ben want tech fame and fortune, Talking Angela wants to be a singer, Talking Ginger, the neighbor kid, just wants to be involved, and as for Talking Hank… Well, Hank just wants to watch TV and eat! Although their plans never seem to work out the way they plan, their adventures are just too amazing to miss! 
 
For more fun...
▶︎ here’s the very popular Talking Tom’s channel https://www.youtube.com/TalkingTom 
▶︎ visit Talking Angela's YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/TalkingAngela 
▶︎ don’t miss out on Talking Ginger's YouTube channel https://www.youtube.com/TalkingGinger 
 
▶︎ смотри "Говорящий Том и Друзья" на русском https://www.youtube.com/TomFriendsRu 
▶︎ Vea Talking Tom and Friends en español https://www.youtube.com/TomFriendsEs 
▶︎ Assista Talking Tom and Friends Brasil em Português https://www.youtube.com/TomFriendsBr
 
 
Talking Tom and Friends are also known as:  Sprechender Tom und Freunde, Tom qui parle et ses amis, Talking Tom y sus amigos, Tom Falante e Amigos, Talking Tom e Amici, Konuşan Tom ve Arkadaşları, توم المتكلم والأصدقاء
